title: config
content: # `prefect.cli.config` Command line interface for working with profiles ## Functions ### `set_` ```python theme={null} set_(settings: list[str]) ``` Change the value for a setting by setting the value in the current profile. ### `validate` ```python theme={null} validate() ``` Read and validate the current profile. Deprecated settings will be automatically converted to new names unless both are set. ### `unset` ```python theme={null} unset(setting_names: list[str], confirm: bool = typer.Option(False, '--yes', '-y')) ``` Restore the default value for a setting. Removes the setting from the current profile. ### `view` ```python theme={null} view(show_defaults: bool = typer.Option(False, '--show-defaults/--hide-defaults', help=show_defaults_help), show_sources: bool = typer.Option(True, '--show-sources/--hide-sources', help=show_sources_help), show_secrets: bool = typer.Option(False, '--show-secrets/--hide-secrets', help='Toggle display of secrets setting values.')) ``` Display the current settings.
